channel.title: 夢・見る・ピノキオ 音楽
channel.description: Recent content on 夢・見る・ピノキオ 音楽

item.title: Vol.661 懐かしの食堂、暖簾の味
item.description: Yes I’m Ready / Barbara Mason Stand By Your Man / Tammy Wynette In My Life / Judy Collins She’s Got You / Pasty Cline Redemption / Bob Marley & The Wailers Chains / The Cookies Try a Little Tenderness / Otis Redding What the World Needs Now is Love / Jackie De Shannon Son of a Preacher / Dusty Springfield He’ll Have to Go / Jim Reeves

item.title: Vol.660 早春の三陸 浜めぐり
item.description: Material Girl / Madonna Rock With You / Michael Jackson We Built This City / Starship Lovin’ You / Minnie Riperton Sailing / Rod Stewart Everybody’s Talkin’ / Harry Nilsson What A Fool Believes / The Doobie Brothers Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree / Tony Orlando & Dawn Together Forever / Rick Astley Dropping Bombs On The Whitehouse / The Style Council Brandy’ / Looking Glass Sunday / Buster Another Day / Paul McCartney Lonely Boy / Andrew Gold Silver Moon / Michael Nesmith & The First National Band

item.title: Vol.659 もりおか 珈琲 MY LOVE
item.description: Coffee Time / Giana Viscardi & Michi Ruzitschka Babe / Styx Simone / England Dan & John Ford Corey I Have A Dream / ABBA (The Long To Be) Close To You / Carpenters Black Coffee / Giana Viscardi & Michi Ruzitschka Super Trouper / ABBA I’m Not In Love / 10cc If / Bread Another Day / Paul McCartaey Angel Eyes / Olivia Newton-John Tea For Two / Giana Viscardi & Michi Ruzitschka Yesterday Once More / Carpenters

item.title: Vol.658 ひなあそび
item.description: Ol’ 55 / Ian Matthews Unforgettable / Natalie Cole & Nat King Cole Your Turn Now / John David Souther Nearsighted / Rupert Holmes Wishin’ And Hopin / Dusty Springfield Talking In Your Sleep / Crystal Gayle Wives And Lovers / Jack Jones Reflection / Lea Salonga

item.title: Vol.657 チーズのおはなし
item.description: My Guy / Mary Wells Where Did Our Love Go / The Supremes The Tears Of A Clown / Smokey Robinson and The Miracles I’ll Be There / The Jackson 5 Who’s Lovin’ You / The Jackson 5 For Once In My Life / Stevie Wonder My Girl / The Temptations Ain’t No Mountain High Enough / Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell I Can’t Help Myself(Sugar Pie, Honey Bunch) / Four Tops This Old Heart Of Mine(Is Walk For You) / The Isley Brothers What Becomes Of The Brokenhearted / Jimmy Ruffin Baby, I’m For Real / The Originals Reach Out I’ll Be There / Four Tops (Love Is Like A) Heat Wave / Martha Reeves and the Vandellas The Tracks Of My Tears / Smokey Robinson and The Miracles Ain’t Too Proud To Beg / The Temptations Come See About Me / The supremes I Want You Back / The Jackson 5 Baby Love / The Supremes Just My Imagination(Running Away With Me) / The Temptations

item.title: Vol.656 日本酒に魅せられて…
item.description: You’ve Got A Friend / James Taylor Oh, Pretty Woman / Roy Orbison Just The Way You Are / Billy Joel Reminiscing / Little River Band Break Away / Art Garfunkel Lowdown / Boz Scaggs Until You Come Back To Me / Aretha Franklin Jessie’s Girl / Rick Springfield Have You Ever Seen The Rain / Creedence Clearwater Revival Private Eye / Hall & Oates Perfect / Fairground Attraction Fool / Chris Rea My Ever Changing Moods / Sonia Your Song / Elton John

item.title: Vol.655 街物語・花巻編

item.title: Vol.654 ほっこり、雪見の露天風呂

item.title: Vol.651 牡蠣のおはなし
item.description: Happy New Year / ABBA The One That You Love / Air Supply I Need You / Maurice White Right Here Waiting / Richard Marx Can’t Fight This Feeling / REO Speedwagon Lost In Your Eyes / Debbie Gibson Time After Time / Cyndi Lauper Words Get In The Way / Gloria Estefan We’re All Alone / Boz Scaggs Everytime You Go Away / Paul Young I Have A Dream / ABBA After The Love Has Gone / Earth.
